Frame.name: SoundtrackFrameEventFrame

Scripts.OnEnter: Soundtrack.ShowTip(self, "Hide Playback Controls Buttons", "Hides the Playback Controls buttons, leaving the event and track bars.");
Soundtrack.ShowTip(self, "Playback Controls Buttons", "Determines the location of the Playback Controls buttons relative to the Playback Controls frame.")

Scripts.OnClick: Soundtrack.Settings.EnableZoneMusic = not Soundtrack.Settings.EnableZoneMusic if Soundtrack.Settings.EnableZoneMusic == true then Soundtrack.Util.DebugPrint("Zone Music ON") else Soundtrack.Util.DebugPrint("Zone Music OFF") end

FontString.text: • Si63 - Random setting for playlists fix (1.24b)
